subject: Re: [sugar] New stable build, 385/q2b87
body:

> Build 385 and firmware q2b87 form a new stable build. We do not

Quick note - on my B2 that pair is failing to start Xorg, last lines
in Xorg.0.log are

   AMD(0): xf86UnMapVidMem: cannot find region for [0xb7xbb000,0x0]
   AMD(0): xf86UnMapVidMem: cannot find region for [0xb7cb4000,0x0]
   AMD(0): xf86UnMapVidMem: cannot find region for [0xb7cb3000,0x0]
   FreeFontPath: FPE "built-ins" refcount is 2, should be 1; fixing

Will debug further and confirm - may very well be a mistake on my part.

cheers


martin
